website_summaries.verdict: Ivation’s 13-Pint model is a worthwhile option if you’re pressed for space, need to treat smaller spaces, or need a quieter and fairly inexpensive dehumidifier.
cons: This model works best in cooler climates
You may have to empty a 13-pint reservoir more often than larger models

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing investment: Only lasted 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We got this in March. After 6 weeks it started rattling. Sometimes it starts sounding like a helicopter is going to take off. We were so excited that this portable, lightweight unit might meet our needs, but now we are outside the return window and out $180 investment. There is a mechanical flaw in this design. Unless they fix it, do not waste your money! Edited*** Amazon Product Support arranged for us to receive a new unit to exchange for the old one.
customer_reviews.author: TheRogers

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTEY AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this compact dehumidifier for a little storage room in my basement that always felt damp and had a distinct odor when you opened the door. The space was less than 100 sq. ft. This little unit takes all the humidity out of the space that has a cinderblock wall that seems to always be damp. As if that wasn't enough, it smells fresh and clean even though we just painted it with Drylock which stinks everything up. The size is PERFECT, it performs AMAZING, it is QUIET, EFFICIENT and WORTH EVERY SINGLE PENNY! Don't hesitate to purchase this product. I am AMAZED and you will be too!! DON'T HESITATE!!! BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: Also a HEATER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, this unit is also a heater, and there is very little reference to this function when purchasing. It kicks out warm air, probably around 90-100 degrees F. If that isn't a problem for your application, the unit may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Azonuser

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased thiscdehumidifier in July. It quit working in September. It’s like new. Nothing happened except it simply won’t turn on. Do not buy this unit. It is junk
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M. Gould

customer_reviews.title: Drain Hose Issue
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a 3 because I bought it primarily for the continuous hose drain function since I'm using it in a boat. I found that I had to remove the hose to install/remove the cannister to prevent damaging the cannister. Normally you would not need to remove the cannister when using the hose but since I had it installed on an unlevel surface, the cannister filled up and shut down the unit. I have since found that when I leveled out the unit that it drained through the hose and not into the cannister. Also, the provided hose is subject to kinking which prevents water flow.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Schleis

customer_reviews.title: These items suck.  They last one month and then start making very loud noise.
customer_reviews.text: The Manufacturer sent me a replacement for an item that completely failed after 6 months. The new unit has now started making very loud rattling sounds after only one month. I will never buy one of these again. NEVER. I advise you to NEVER BUY. Waste of money. Wish I could get a refund. Excessively expensive. MADE IN CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Compact and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this dehumidifier for our 35 foot weekender sailboat and could not be happier. We have always had a problem with year-round humidity in this environment, and several times a year must wipe down interior surfaces that develop patches of mold and mildew. Since adding this dehumidifier, we have no issues with moisture buildup! Before leaving the boat at the end of the weekend, we place the unit on the cabinet beside the galley (kitchen) sink, turn the unit on and place the drain hose in the sink drain. It works like a charm! We return to a boat each Friday with low interior humidity! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: This small dehumidifier is the perfect fit for our truck camper. Keeping moisture out when we’re not using it will prevent that musty smell all too common in RVs. It’s the right size and pulls an amazing amount of water out of the air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: It is down in my crawl space, so I don't know if it is quiet or not. I can say that it is keeping a space larger than 270 SQ feet at 60% humidity. I have tried several options for humidity control and this is the first one that has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but drain tube doesn't always work.
customer_reviews.text: This works well at low temp (40F). It will remove all of the moisture down to the setting. However, I connected it to a drain tube so that I didn't have to empty the tank. The tank will still fill up and shut it down. Not ideal, but something I can live with.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: The drain hose attachment doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The drain hose attachment does not work. The resovior continues to fill up even with hose connected. Would like to speak to someone about this dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot air
customer_reviews.text: It’s good. It’s been collecting water quicker than I expected. The hot air that comes out from the machine is a little more than I expected I am not sure I like that so much. For warm weather it’s a bummer. But it does make the place much less humid.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Started making constant loud noise.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the first few months. Then internal wheel went crazy and made constant loud noise. Now I think it’s quit altogether. Too expensive to last less than a year. Genuine plastic junk.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Friday

customer_reviews.title: Great for an RV if you don't mind a little noise
customer_reviews.text: This device produces heat when running on high. Just a warning for anyone that might NOT want a heater built into their dehumidifier. It has an odd odor when it first activates but the smell fades. Very efficient for use in an RV, if you don't mind a rattle noise. After about 3 weeks of use, the fan started rattling (mainly at low speed) so I contacted tech support and they sent me a replacement ASAP. About a month later that one started rattling also but they sent me another replacement again. Great tech support but they need to work out the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Grant G

customer_reviews.title: The 7/16 fitting  is missing
customer_reviews.text: Too late to return ..couldn't hook it up till a week ago...not liking it at all..
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel trailers
customer_reviews.text: We live in a 32 foot travel trailer. Condensation is our enemy, especially in the winter. This unit is incredible at keeping us from living in a mold factory. It’s quiet, easy and oh so effective. I wish I had of gotten this last year instead of three of the little compressor units.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit for our camper.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. It is very quiet and the first time we used it, we kept on checking on it too see if it was still running. It works great in our new camper and it dropped the humidity from 70 % down to 45%. We would recommend it to anyone with a camper that wants to lower the humidity. Our camper is only 28 feet by 8 feet so we needed a small dehumidifier and the size of this one is perfect. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Degree

customer_reviews.title: Dry trailer, even under the matress!
customer_reviews.text: We had a long time leak in our 2015 trailer. Water was in walls and floors. This thing pulled all the water from the walls and floors and made the trailer completely dry! Even the area under the mattresses was dry. I was able to be in the trailer and not feel cold from the dampness, and it was raining outside. It is still running but no longer on continuous, but on cycle. Works great and is keeping everything dry and free of mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: This thing really pulls the moisture out of the air. I have it in a basement bedroom/bathroom area that is always damp in summer. I set this up, and right out of the box, it worked well, pulling out a full container of water out about every 12 hours! However, after about 3-4 days of use, it developed a rattle, which continues. Not sure how to fix or if I can. It still dehumidifies, but would be too noisy to run when someone's sleeping down there.
customer_reviews.author: taekwondomom

customer_reviews.title: Developed a rattle
customer_reviews.text: About 2.5 months after purchasing and using regularly, it developed a constant rattle. We never moved it or bumped and cannot understand why it started this loud rattle. We carefully took it apart and couldn’t see anything inside to make the rattling. We can only stand to have it running while we aren’t in the room. Very disappointed in this expensive product. We would never recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sockeye

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: It really pulls moisture from our kitchen area. Humidity is horrible in La, making a difference in our floors not warping. Fixing to buy 2 bigger ones.?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little unit for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Works well in our 300 sq ft cabin. After running a lot for the first few days, it can now keep the humidity at a comfortable 50% with only needing to empty it once a day. Works well in cool temps (our temp is usually between 50F and 60F. Noise level is on par with a tower fan when running on high.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: lacks in quality components, otherwise a fantastic dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit about three weeks ago, and was very happy with it. Solves two problems, tempature and humidity, and has worked wonderfully well... until today. I just turned the unit on to maintain the room’s temperature and humidity, unfortunately as others have reported, it’s developed a rattle. So disappointing as everything about this dehumidifier is fantastic, except, the quality. For $200 I expect years of use, not three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Goss

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR TRAVEL TRAILER!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with condensation inherent in heating with propane. Smaller size and low energy consumption work well for our needs. Super durable...we dropped it from counter height and other than a hairline crack in the plastic it's still like new. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Compact Yet Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to use in a small bathroom. Very pleased with it. The only con is that the air that blows out is very hot. Maybe all dehumidifier is like this? It's my first one.
customer_reviews.author: bun

customer_reviews.title: I am ready for summer's high humidity!
customer_reviews.text: My dehumidifier is up and running and I know it will be super here in Ct when the humidity is high- I am ready !
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Bynoe

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at the ease of use / overall design.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a trial run in my garage prior to putting it to use in the RV. Collected enough over night to fill ~1/3 the reservoir. Impressive! Ran this for another 4 days in the garage with similar results each day. Finally started using in the RV (seasonal storage). Runs quietly, LED displays are easy to follow and the smooth contours are pleasing to the eye. Easier and less messy than the pellet dehydration system I used for years. I like this unit!
customer_reviews.author: John W Larson

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective at Decreasing Humidity
customer_reviews.text: Using for a 27 ft RV. Works very well. Like the quiet overbite mode. Amazing how much water is collected over night. Puts out quite a lot of heat. Don't need any other heat source at this time in a quite cool northwest summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Bedroom Closet
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine a lot. I got it for my bedroom closet when some mold spots appeared on clothing. It's very lightweight but is well built and really quiet, even when running on high. Water container holds a half gallon, and has a carrying handle which makes it easy to empty. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for RV cold weather condensation problems. Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 42 ft 5th wheel and was having some condensation forming on inside of the rig during nighttime cold weather. I put one in the basement storage area and one in the living room. I use continuous hose drainage for the storage area unit simply draining out the built-in port for incoming water line connection. They do kick off some heat which is very helpful during the cold nights to not need much heat from either our furnace or roof top heat pump. PROBLEM SOLVED!
customer_reviews.author: Organic Girl

customer_reviews.title: Quiet assurance ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so quiet I have to check to make sure it's on. Small water capacity, but still a wonderful product for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works great, removes lots of humidity, leaving in constant mode via the included drain hose is a big plus. Very quiet operation even when left on all night. Great for our boat! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: craftsman

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm...no refrigerant
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm!..very quiet especially in sleep mode. Draws lotsa water from the air with minimal power. I have mine set up with the hose, in a tub we do not use, so that I do not have to mess with draining the tank... My only complaint is that is does warm the room a bit
customer_reviews.author: Lanwmowerman

customer_reviews.title: Ivation does it!
customer_reviews.text: The Ivation desiccant humidifier replaced a very noisy, old humidifier that only worked in warm temps. With all the winter snow and spring rains we were getting water seepage in the basement. This really did the trick. It gently warms the area as well. It is easy to use & lightweight. After looking at many different brands this seemed to have the best reviews. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Link

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3-4 Months
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** I sent an email 2 weeks ago but had no response. So, I have a product that does not work properly, and a customer service that does not care. I should have checked the reviews before buying, I could just copy and paste a few reviews here because the issue is the same. Works very well for a few months ( and silently) then the noise starts. It's getting to a point that Ihave to umplug because it feels unsafe to leave unattended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Saraiva

customer_reviews.title: Bought used - Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Bought used, received, plugged in, hit the power button and.... nothing. Tried everything - different outlets, fiddled with the collection container in case a kill switch was stuck. No luck. Amazon customer service was awesome but considering this was my first used purchase via Amazon, it has me seriously questioning quality assurance.
customer_reviews.author: DCAT

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have found this humidifier to be so easy to use thanks to the LCD screen that comes with it. I can also set the humidity levels to the exact ones that I want as well as the fan speed. I especialy like the timer and sleep mode, that way I don't have to manually turn it off when I am done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Milra Ratur

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: Currently there is a problem with the water tank draining. trying to resolve. It is quiet, compact and gives off heat which is good in a basement. It also seems to last much longer than a 'traditional' dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: North Gate Outlander

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Efficient
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we are living on our sailboat and spending the winter in Ireland after having crossed the Atlantic. We started noticing heavy condensation last month, despite having a smaller dehumidifier and desiccant tubs. Since plugging this in, the boat has been dry. This has the added benefit of providing heat, so we haven't had to use the boat's heating system as often. We're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: none
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a "little house". It works great!
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this dehumidifier in a small utility closest that I just want to keep mold and mildew from forming in. It works very well for that task and its low power.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the air coming out is SUPER HOT.
customer_reviews.text: I used a thermometer and measured the air temp at 122 degrees F coming out of the blower. That's way hotter than my basement compressor style dehumidifier. Works well but definitely warms a room when running a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa P.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet. It sits between our toilet and shower. We have the hose drain into the shower. I really like the digital thermometer, watching the humidity and temp rise and then fall after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Kolmer

customer_reviews.title: Comes with several drainage options
customer_reviews.text: It is so convenient that this dehumidifier comes with several drainage options!
customer_reviews.author: Filberto

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase, and they have great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our camper and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick. Dehumidifier is a powerful unit. Reduced the humidity in my apartment quickly and quietly. Worked so well that I did not need to use my air conditioner during our hot and humid weather. Quiet as well.
customer_reviews.author: ldunn

customer_reviews.title: Short Product Life
customer_reviews.text: In the first months it was quiet and removed a lot of water from the basement room it was placed in. I purchased it in May, and by September it was making a rumbling sound and had an off smell. I have cleaned the filter and emptied the water container as instructed. I contacted the company and they sent me a new unit free of charge. This has been a positive experience and I have now purchased a second unit to place in my RV.
customer_reviews.author: D Martinelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehumidifier!
customer_reviews.text: It’s quit, it’s easy to use. Much more practical than a compressor dehumidifier. I’m using it in a motor home and it fits nicely and is unobtrusive. Well built, whisper quiet and most of all, it sucks water out of the air! The display shows humidity level and temp as well as a notification the unit needs to be emptied. A+!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly removes humidity from my living room. The unit is very quiet (perfectly quiet initially) but recently I started to hear a little noise from the moving parts inside the unit. Overall however is still very quiet and absolutely does the job that is supposed to do (removing humidity from the room). Nicely build, doesn't feel cheap and nice modern clean lines design.
customer_reviews.author: GPr

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time in the winter
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite humidifier that I have ever gotten as it does such a good job of getting rid of moisture and all of the weird smells that come with it. I especially use it during the winter times and I feel so much better with it. It's also really light and yet it works so well. I am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Owens Guntar

customer_reviews.title: DEHUMIDIFER
customer_reviews.text: BIGEST PROBLEM IS THAT THE AREA ITS IN GETS VERY WARM. I USED IT IN MY BOAT. THE DRAIN HOSE WAS HOOKED UP BUT DID NOT DRAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Girkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous dehumidifier. We have had it for several weeks now and it does the job. We put it in the bays of our rv.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Nice little dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little dehumidifier. Got it for my daughter for a spare room with stairs off to the side. It puts out some heat and you can adjust where the heat blows out, to a certain degree. Definitely recommend for a smallish space.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product! I bought it for my 32 ft rv. Works excellent. Collects 19 pints in less than 24 hours. Totally worth every dollar. The air in my rv is normal finally. No more moist feeling sheets an clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Denise

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, compact and quiet dehumidifier. I use it on my boat cabin, and it keeps the interior nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: 2 dud's in a row
customer_reviews.text: 1st unit didn't work, Amazon exchanged it. 2nd Unit didn't work either asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with this little dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier does one heck of a job. It works exactly as advertised if not better, It keeps our RV at whatever humidity I set it for. Also because it kicks out some warm air the furnace hardly has to run, that is saying a lot in the wet Northwest.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this dehumidifier for about 3 weeks thus far nearly continuous operation in 250 sq ft shop with average temperature about 42 F. Outside humidity varies 50% to 90+% while inside at 40 to 47%. Air emitted from unit is warm, measured at approx 100F at outlet. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: John T. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, is quiet and works well but after the second day of use it started making a defective noise. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your unit is new!
customer_reviews.text: We started to hear a rattling noise after two weeks, so we decided to return it and order another one. We just got the ‘new’ one, and it is dirty and looks used with water marks everywhere. Now, we have to return this one, too! Such a waste of time!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is very quiet. Has different settings which has come to be helpful. Emptied my travel trailer of condensation in no time!
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders
customer_reviews.text: This product works wonders. It totally resolved a moisture issue in my home. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: verj

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the size worry you
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect dehumidifier for my finished basement. It is a third of the size of the one being replaced. The noise level is very low and it fits in a small area in the laundry room and with the drain hose there is no need to empty it. Would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: julie  Zibas

customer_reviews.title: Dehumidifier does the job
customer_reviews.text: After I figured out how to work the unit, it works like a charm. I have it draining into a bucket which is filled up every single day, so you can see this was a necessary item.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for low temperature use
customer_reviews.text: Small, quiet, does job well, great for low temp dehumidification. The air from the unit is very warm. The drain attachment works fine, but it would be nice to be able to attach a conventional hose to the drain instead of the tube that is supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The light weight is a plus because I plan to use on my sailboat
customer_reviews.text: I would have preferred a non-electronic display/control. My other desiccant dehumidifier has a dual with better control ,Otherwise the unit is quiet and appears to be efficient. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M Eng

customer_reviews.title: The LCD display is very helpful
customer_reviews.text: The LCD display that comes with this dehumidifier is so helpful and very intuitive to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Kolten

customer_reviews.title: Light and powerful at the same time
customer_reviews.text: I like how it is light that way I can move it from one room to another with ease and yet it is so powerful at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Annsen

customer_reviews.title: Works in hot and cold temperatures
customer_reviews.text: I like how this dehumidifier is able to work in both really hot and cold temperatures that way I can carry it everywhere with me.
customer_reviews.author: Garrott

customer_reviews.title: Not a product that lasts
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier lasted 11 months and then it died. It worked ok for the small space I was using it in, but now only the fan runs, but it no longer pulls the humidity from the space.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has been running continuously for several months in my basement draining to the sump pump. No more musty smell! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN S. MOSER

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and setup is easy. Unit is quite small but seems to handle ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and setup is easy. Unit is quite small but seems to handle my basement well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Using in a horse trailer tack room and keeps humidity to 15%.
customer_reviews.author: todd w allberry

customer_reviews.title: Great product and feature's
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, wish I had purchased a long time ago, does a wonderful job in a very short time and the feature's are great. I strongly recommend this dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Nice Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Got it in the RV to regulate humidity in storage. Had it a week and so far so good. Nice size, looks cool and all the features you need. I like the display.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camper to keep humidity down during the off season. What a difference! The air just feels clean upon entering the camper after it has been shut up. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quieter than my compressor unit. Couple of months continuous use in traveltrailer. So far working perfect. Easily maintains the humidity at 50% in 25 ft trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin W.

customer_reviews.title: so far perfect size and working like a little
customer_reviews.text: Using in 26 foot rev...so far perfect size and working like a little dynamo
customer_reviews.author: pmark

customer_reviews.title: Quiet !
customer_reviews.text: Used this inside a small vault. It is much quieter than previous one.
customer_reviews.author: N. Metropoulos

customer_reviews.title: NOT A FAN OF THE FAN
customer_reviews.text: The fan started becoming quite loud after a few months. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Kaady

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our beach condo. Bought to help lower the humidity levels in our condo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fix for a mold problem - Draws a surprising amount of water.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I discovered some mold around the window trim in our master bath and figured the moist bathroom air was to blame. After nearly a month, there has been no recurrence of mold and this quite little unit takes in at least half a gallon of water a day. I didn’t realize how much water was in the air there but I can notice the improvement in air quality. If you have an asthmatic in the family, mold can be an insidious trigger so a unit like this may help to improve the quality of the air in small rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gries

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how small the unit was - but it certainly does the trick! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: KatD

customer_reviews.title: Only works a small portion of the day and can't figure out why
customer_reviews.text: 1st of all the hose it comes with bends no matter what blocking the water shutting off the machine. Take that out and every time I look at the machine it is on auto pause? The industrial machines are easier to use than these and the instructions that come with it are not helpful with my issues I am having with the machine. Going to do more research on the auto pause issue but I am fairly confident I will be returning this product. And this is not a full tank issue the tank in it has never been more than 50% full
customer_reviews.author: mathew

customer_reviews.title: Rating depends on how you want to drain dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: The unit overall is compact and does a nice job working in a colder basement but it is poorly designed for hooking up a hose and leaving the unit unattended. Not one but two units have failed to operate properly with the hose attached, they both drain into the bucket and stop running. After calling Ivation about the first unit they assured me that even though other reviewers were having the same issue, something was wrong with the first unit. I gave them the benefit of doubt and requested from Amazon (5 Stars) a replacement. The second unit does the same thing so if you want this run to unattended with a hose look elsewhere as the Ivation will not.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Flemming

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my motorhome in Minnesota. I have a 37 foot with one slide out. It's perfect! It's lightweight, quiet and pulls all the humidity with room to spare. As long as this keeps running for years to come, I will always highly recommend it. I run it with the hose hookup into the sink but I plan to run a line to the underside of the RV.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: DBRoth was very accommodating when I contacted them about excessive noise and they promptly sent a replacement unit. Unfortunately, the replacement unit has quickly become noisy also. It's annoyingly loud. The unit does suck the moisture out of the air. I knew it produced heat, but I didn't expect it to act like a "space heater". I would still buy it again because it does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: LWHepburn

customer_reviews.title: No more condensation! Ultra quiet!
customer_reviews.text: We have been dealing with condensation on the windows and vets and walls of our RV. This has been the perfect solution. No more water drips! It’s so quiet and even has a sleep setting for ultra sensitive light sleepers. We have ours in our bedroom. For those on solar, it only uses 280 watts on low.
customer_reviews.author: TTNelson

customer_reviews.title: Does a good consistent job
customer_reviews.text: This little desiccant is probably best for a smaller space -- i have it up in the living room / kitchen partition area and the overall space is probably too large -- but it does consistently reduce the overall humidity from 55% to 50%, which helps and gets it within the recommended range. i have the unit running constantly, and end up emptying the water condensation container about once a day. the unit is quiet at night, not a bother at all. It is easy to set up and to empty out the condensation container when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a difference! Easy to find a place for it and handy to being able to dump. we did receive a good length of tubing for being able to have drainage if we wanted. The place we have it does not allow for that. The pull out box at bottom of unit is easy to pull out and I use the water for my plants. Anyone looking for a small unit to assist with moisture levels this is it.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier does a great job. It runs quiet. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: I love that this dehumidifier is compact and lightweight. It works very well; just what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Narloch

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after four days of non-continuous use.  Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to dehumidify a small space. Everything worked well at first, and I emptied the reservoir several times over three days' use. However, on the fourth day, I emptied the reservoir in the evening, and left it running, trusting to the auto cutoff to work. When I checked it the next morning, the unit was off and the reservoir was full. "Working as intended," I thought. I emptied the reservoir, put it back in, and pressed the "on" button. No response. Tried a different outlet. No response. Do not recommend. It's a complete waste of money. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Maura K

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had this unit for several days and it’s working great. Very impressed how much water it can extract. In low mode it’s very quit.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyInTexas

customer_reviews.title: RV condensation problem solved
customer_reviews.text: I use this to keep condensation under control in my 27ft travel trailer while living in it during the winter. I tried smaller table top dehumidifiers, but they made no noticeable difference. The Ivation has completely eliminated any condensation on the windows when I wake up in the morning. I’m shocked at how well it’s worked. It’s small, light weight, and very quiet. I only run it at night and could probably go 3-4 days before needed to empty it. I dump it every day, though since it’s so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny! Great Dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.text: One of the Best Appliances I’ve ever used. Is a dream. Am amazed at how well it works. Quiet and very easy to use. It really works as a dehumidifier. Our bathroom is dry and mildew Free for the first time. It works at colder temperature. I would not skimp with the less expensive small room dehumidifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit! Super effective, easy to use, and pretty quiet. Throws off a fair amount of heat but we don’t mind as it leaves the bathroom pleasantly warm. May purchase a second unit for our second bath.
customer_reviews.author: M Long

customer_reviews.title: Works well in our RV
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a good quality dehumidifier that worked well with a reasonable sized footprint for our RV. The Ivation 13-Pint Small-Area Desiccant Dehumidifier has worked well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Texas_Express

customer_reviews.title: I can see thru my RV windows now!
customer_reviews.text: I tried smaller/cheaper units, but decided to splurge on this Ivation 13-Pint. It is incredibly efficient, quiet and we no longer have any condensation in the RV while camping. There will be 4 pints of water in the removable tray after the second day when we camp in the Fall/Winter. I just empty it instead of hooking up the hose. No more wiping down all the windows every few hours, no more dripping into the window frames/walls. 100% satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Metz

customer_reviews.title: I would buy from this buyer again
customer_reviews.text: I would buy from this buyer again. A very nice unit. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

product_meta.title: Ivation 13-Pint Small-Area Desiccant Dehumidifier Compact and Quiet - With Continuous Drain Hose for Smaller Spaces, Bathroom, Attic, Crawlspace and Closets - For Spaces Up To 270 Sq Ft, White
feature_bullets: 13-PINT DESICCANT DEHUMIDIFIER – Highly Efficient Desiccant Rotor Removes Moisture, Odors & Mold While Warming Ambient Air; Perfect for Colder Seasons
LIGHTWEIGHT BUT POWERFUL – Enjoy Adjustable Humidity Control & Whisper Quiet Operation for Small Spaces Up to 270 Sq/Ft in Home, RV, Boat or Laundry Room
USER-FRIENDLY LCD DISPLAY – Sleek Digital Interface Lets You Power On/Off & Adjust Humidity, Fan Speed, Timer/Sleep Mode, Vent Swing & Screen Brightness
MULTIPLE DRAINAGE OPTIONS – High Capacity Reservoir Holds Up to ½ Gallon of Water for True Portability; Includes Connection Hose for Continuous Drainage
VERSATILE PERFORMANCE – Works in Temperatures from 33°F to 104°F; Convenient Carry Handle, Washable Filter, Alerts, Auto-Shutoff & Adjustable Swinging Air Vent
